mapper.insert: insert into TBL013 ( BN_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, INP_DT, AMD_DT, AMD_MBR_ID ) values ( (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})), #{pnMntRtNo}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{bnMbrId} )
insert into TBL015 ( BN_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, USE_YN, INP_DT, AMD_MBR_ID ) values ( (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})), #{pnMntRtNo}, #{useYn}, SYSDATE(), #{bnMbrId} )
mapper.select: select T.*, ta.* from (select a.PN_MNT_RT_NO, a.PN_MNT_RT_NM, a.PN_MNT_AMT from TBL010 a, TBL013 b WHERE a.PN_MNT_RT_NO = b.PN_MNT_RT_NO and b.BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and a.PN_CARR =#{pnCarr} and a.PN_NET_TYPE =#{pnNetType}) T left join ( select PN_MDL_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, PN_OFCL_SUBSD, PN_EXT_SUBSD_DV, PN_EXT_SUBSD_RT, PN_EXT_SERV_YN, PN_ETC, SELL_YN, PN_STOR from `TBL007-A` where PN_MDL_NO = #{pnMdlNo} and BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and PN_STOR=#{pnStor}) ta on T.PN_MNT_RT_NO = ta.PN_MNT_RT_NO ORDER BY convert(PN_MNT_AMT, decimal) DESC

select T.*, tb.* from (select a.PN_MNT_RT_NO, a.PN_MNT_RT_NM, a.PN_MNT_AMT from TBL010 a, TBL013 b WHERE a.PN_MNT_RT_NO = b.PN_MNT_RT_NO and b.BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and a.PN_CARR =#{pnCarr} and a.PN_NET_TYPE =#{pnNetType}) T left join ( select PN_MDL_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, PN_OFCL_SUBSD, PN_EXT_SUBSD_DV, PN_EXT_SUBSD_RT, PN_EXT_SERV_YN, PN_ETC, SELL_YN, PN_STOR from `TBL007-B` where PN_MDL_NO = #{pnMdlNo} and BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and PN_STOR=#{pnStor}) tb on T.PN_MNT_RT_NO = tb.PN_MNT_RT_NO ORDER BY convert(PN_MNT_AMT, decimal) DESC

select T.*, tc.* from (select a.PN_MNT_RT_NO, a.PN_MNT_RT_NM, a.PN_MNT_AMT from TBL010 a, TBL013 b WHERE a.PN_MNT_RT_NO = b.PN_MNT_RT_NO and b.BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and a.PN_CARR =#{pnCarr} and a.PN_NET_TYPE =#{pnNetType}) T left join ( select PN_MDL_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, PN_OFCL_SUBSD, PN_EXT_SUBSD_DV, PN_EXT_SUBSD_RT, PN_EXT_SERV_YN, PN_ETC, SELL_YN, PN_STOR from `TBL007-C` where PN_MDL_NO = #{pnMdlNo} and BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and PN_STOR=#{pnStor}) tc on T.PN_MNT_RT_NO = tc.PN_MNT_RT_NO ORDER BY convert(PN_MNT_AMT, decimal) DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into `TBL007-A` ( SELL_COND_NO, PN_MDL_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, MNT_CARR, PN_STOR, BN_NO, PN_OFCL_SUBSD, PN_EXT_SUBSD_DV, PN_EXT_SUBSD_RT, PN_EXT_SERV_YN, PN_ETC,
SELL_YN, INP_DT, AMD_DT, AMD_MBR_ID ) values ( (SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE() , '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(SELL_COND_NO,9)),0)+1,8,0), '')) as SELL_COND_NO FROM `TBL007-A` ta WHERE SELL_COND_NO LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'),'%')), #{pnMdlNo}, #{pnMntRtNo}, #{mntCarr}, #{pnStor}, (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})), #{pnOfclSubsd}, #{pnExtSubsdDv}, #{pnExtSubsdRt}, #{pnExtServYn}, #{pnEtc},
'Y', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{bnMbrId} )

insert into `TBL007-B` ( SELL_COND_NO, PN_MDL_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, MNT_CARR, PN_STOR, BN_NO, PN_OFCL_SUBSD, PN_EXT_SUBSD_DV, PN_EXT_SUBSD_RT, PN_EXT_SERV_YN, PN_ETC,
SELL_YN, INP_DT, AMD_DT, AMD_MBR_ID ) values ( (SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE() , '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(SELL_COND_NO,9)),0)+1,8,0), '')) as SELL_COND_NO FROM `TBL007-B` tb WHERE SELL_COND_NO LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'),'%')), #{pnMdlNo}, #{pnMntRtNo}, #{mntCarr}, #{pnStor}, (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})), #{pnOfclSubsd}, #{pnExtSubsdDv}, #{pnExtSubsdRt}, #{pnExtServYn}, #{pnEtc},
'Y', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{bnMbrId} )

insert into `TBL007-C` ( SELL_COND_NO, PN_MDL_NO, PN_MNT_RT_NO, MNT_CARR, PN_STOR, BN_NO, PN_OFCL_SUBSD, PN_EXT_SUBSD_DV, PN_EXT_SUBSD_RT, PN_EXT_SERV_YN, PN_ETC,
SELL_YN, INP_DT, AMD_DT, AMD_MBR_ID ) values ( (SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE() , '%Y%m%d'), IFNULL(LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(SELL_COND_NO,9)),0)+1,8,0), '')) as SELL_COND_NO FROM `TBL007-C` as tc WHERE SELL_COND_NO LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'),'%')), #{pnMdlNo}, #{pnMntRtNo}, #{mntCarr}, #{pnStor}, (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})), #{pnOfclSubsd}, #{pnExtSubsdDv}, #{pnExtSubsdRt}, #{pnExtServYn}, #{pnEtc},
'Y', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{bnMbrId} )

insert into `TBL016` ( INP_DT, SELL_COND_TYPE, SELL_COND_NO, SELL_YN, PN_OFCL_SUBSD, PN_EXT_SUBSD_DV, PN_EXT_SUBSD_RT, PN_EXT_SERV_YN, PN_ETC, AMD_MBR_ID ) values ( sysdate(),
'A', (SELECT SELL_COND_NO FROM `TBL007-A`
'B', (SELECT SELL_COND_NO FROM `TBL007-B`
'C', (SELECT SELL_COND_NO FROM `TBL007-C`
WHERE PN_MDL_NO = #{pnMdlNo} and PN_STOR = #{pnStor} and PN_MNT_RT_NO = #{pnMntRtNo} and BN_NO = (SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) ), #{sellYn}, #{pnOfclSubsd}, #{pnExtSubsdDv}, #{pnExtSubsdRt}, #{pnExtServYn}, #{pnEtc}, #{bnMbrId} )
mapper.select: select * from `TBL007-A` where BN_NO=(SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and SELL_YN = 'Y' and PN_MNT_RT_NO=#{pnMntRtNo}
select * from `TBL007-B` where BN_NO=(SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and SELL_YN = 'Y' and PN_MNT_RT_NO=#{pnMntRtNo}
select * from `TBL007-C` where BN_NO=(SELECT cf_get_bn_no(#{bnMbrId})) and SELL_YN = 'Y' and PN_MNT_RT_NO=#{pnMntRtNo}
